high_descs: Pick up the tissue box at the front of the table.
Bring the tissue box to the lamp on the table next to the couch.
Turn on the lamp on the table.
anns.task_desc: Examine the tissue box in the light of the lamp.

high_descs: Turn around, walk to the tv cabinet
Grab the tissue box on the cabinet
Turn around and walk to the end table with a lamp
anns.task_desc: Grab the tissue box on the TV cabinet, turn on the lamp on the side table

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the desk on your left.
Pick up a box of tissues from the desk.
Turn around and walk to the end table on the other side of the room.
Turn on the lamp on the end table.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a box of tissues, turn on a lamp.
